resources.string: Sets the allowed delay between incoming notifications
Turn the screen off to see the selected notification in action or dismiss this dialog to stop the test
Enables landscape mode on lock screen
Unlock automatically when the correct password is entered
Allows to see the application behind the lock screen
Show widgets maximized and the unlock minimized when the screen is turned on
Allows widgets from the home screen to be added on lock screen
Allowing home screen widgets to be added on lock screen, may lead to security issues, do you want to continue?
View or change custom lock screen shortcuts
When screen off, long-pressing the volume rockers will seek music tracks
Pressing the volume rocker will wake your device
Halo will appear for incoming tasks and scroll out of sight after a while
Applies for task switching and moving gestures
When opening an app with Halo the underlying app will get paused
Halo will disappear completely when empty
Show message box for incoming notifications
Halo will ping when device is unlocked if new notifications were received
Defines how big Halo is going to be
Halo message box animation for incoming notifications
Edge of status bar will pull down Quick Settings
Display number of pending notifications on the status bar
Show separate menu button instead of merging it to recents button
Select the limit of notification icons to be shown on status bar. Applies only to portrait orientation
Disable ticker animation for incoming notifications
View, select or change the layout of the displayed tiles
Dynamic tiles are not always visible and will only show up if triggered by a system event
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Close the Quick Settings panel upon toggle
Open Quick Settings tiles in floating window
Restore the default displayed tiles and layout?
Display the 3-dot overflow menu button within apps
The action overflow button may not be visible until apps are restarted
The action overflow button may not be hidden until apps are restarted
View or change the Sound button modes
Select the location where pie will be placed at
Manage how animations and status additions will be handled
Adjust the angle between screen\'s edge and pie
Adjust the gap that separates pie elements
Center pie on the trigger edge
Avoids orientation change when screen rotates
Always show menu button even when it\'s not necessary
Enable search button on pie controls
Determine the size of the region that registers swipes

1 - To begin editing, tap the lock icon

2 - Tap any button to assign or change functionality

3 - Long press any button to rearrange the order

4 - To save, tap the lock icon again

5 - To restore system default, tap the reset button

• Actions can only be assigned to one button at a time

• The home button cannot be re-assigned

• Side buttons cannot be rearranged
Delete current settings and restore to default?
Sounds to vibrations during vibrate mode
Configure the hours the device should be quiet
Incoming calls will behave like usual during quiet hours
When to start enforcing quiet hours
When to stop enforcing quiet hours
Notification light will function as normal
Haptic feedback will function as normal
Notice:\nAs the start volume is set higher than the ringer volume, the ring tone will be played using the ringer volume.
All brightness levels will be reset to their default settings.
Specify the region code for Wi-Fi
There was a problem setting the region code.
Allowing applications to request root access is very dangerous and could compromise the security of your system!
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Speed up shutdown/startup by avoiding full hardware restart

These settings are included for experimentation and any changes made to them have the potential to cause instability, crashes, data loss or hardware failures.\n\nWe request you do not file bug reports if any of these settings have been changed from the defaults.
Compress memory for increased virtual capacity (requires reboot)
KSM reduces physical memory requirements and improves performance
Purging of bitmap memory assets allows the freeing of more RAM when needed (requires reboot)
Better graphics performance, but lower quality and may cause visual artifacts (requires reboot)

You are about to enable SEAndroid, an advanced security mechanism, on your device.

This option exists for debugging purposes only, and it is very likely that your device isn't fully ready for it, which may cause parts (or all) of your hardware to block or hang.

Are you sure you want to proceed?
Enable Notification Light even when screen is on
Play sound when adjusting volume with hard keys
Turn the screen on when connecting or disconnecting the charger
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Use fade effect instead of electron beam
Hide when there is no traffic
Hide network speed indicator when there is no traffic
Change the color of network speed indicator
Peek at statusbar by swiping from top edge of screen
Limit the notification sounds of each app to only play once per set time period

This RAM bar shows the actual android memory (RAM) utilization. Please note that having cached apps helps your device open apps much faster. For further explanations on how android memory (RAM) management works, check the help menu.
Disable hints on left and right when the screen is turned on.
Delete all user created navigation bar shortcuts and restore to default?
Navigation bar shortcuts reset to default
Drag the slider to targets to assign shortcuts
Delete all user created profiles and app groups and restore them to default?
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Show the notification text around the ring.
Show all notifications including ongoing, non-clearable notifications.
Show active display notifications when you take the device out of your pocket.
Invert the colors when in areas with bright light such as direct sunlight.
Adjust level for notifications when auto brightness is disabled
Show the date above the clock
Show AM/PM indicator next to time when using 12hour format
Hide low priority notifications such as those from Google Now.
Excluded applications will not show up in active display
Kill the foreground app by long-pressing the back key
Wakeup device when smart cover opens
View or change how the \'cLock\' Home and Lock screen widgets will display
Enable TCP/IP debugging over network interfaces (Wi-Fi, USB networks). This setting is reset on reboot

WARNING: When ADB over network is enabled, your phone is open for intrusions on all connected networks, including GSM data network!

Only use this feature when you are connected on trusted networks.

Do you really want to enable this function?
